nodes.bodyText: Please format.
Fixed. Thanks for spotting it.
You could/should set not to use FQN (it should be somewhere in the IDE Options, Java GUI editor). Then, the patch would be a bit more readable. Thanks.
I changed the setting (had no idea it exists) and fixed the file.
Great, thank you.
Changed as suggested.
Should use Collections.unmodifiableList().

nodes.bodyText: Should use package private instead of public.
Fixed.
I would consider i18n because it is not a command or parameter.

nodes.bodyText:
It's kind of special rule - ignored during command parameters building, but still written into settings.
Making it translated would also mean to map value saved into settings to translated value shown in list, right?

nodes.bodyText: This is more about Java and Swing than NetBeans. See the official UI tutorial. This tutorial is fine IMHO and I am pretty sure that you will be able to find a similar case already used in NetBeans ;)

nodes.bodyText:
I created renderer based on PHPStanLevelListCellRenderer.
Value is now only dash '-' and '<none>' is shown in list.
Before testing again you should clean userdir.
